PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1990-04781990-03-090,  ,  ,  ,  NCC,  TB
PrecisOrder providing authority (a) for the National Capital Commission to lease a tract of land containing some 121 hectares to Bell Northern Research Limited for a term of ninety-nine years, the site in question being situate next to Bell Northern's property at Carling Ave. and Moodie Drive, in the City of Nepean, Ontario; (b) for the N.C.C. to use the proceeds to acquire environmentally sensitive lands elsewhere in the Capital region; and (c) to revoke Order in Council P.C. 1988-2351.
Attachments
